location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING ARBITRAL OPINION ON SEISTAN BOUNDARY (GENERAL GOLDSMID'S REPORT 46, AUGUST 21ST 1872.)'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 640 x 460 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: The map shows the decision of the Sistan Arbitration Commission of 1872, led by General Sir Frederic John Goldsmid, on the disputed frontier between Afghanistan and Persia in Sistan.Distinctive features: shows frontier laid down by Arbitrator; frontier claimed by Persian Commissioner; and frontier claimed by Afghan Commissioner.
